lead_paragraph: MATLAW--M. John, of Manhattan, 61, departed April 18, 2016. John, you are much-missed by so many who appreciated your gentle wit, insightful perspectives, and consistent kindness. Incessantly bemused by politics, culture, and Life's daily ironies, he was predeceased by his sister Laura Murphy, father Myron, and mother Julia, for whom John cared throughout many difficult last years. Reminiscences are welcomed at Gabriela's, 688 Columbus Ave. (at 93rd), beginning at 5:00pm on June 2, 2016. 1
